nycTheatreExcerpt: "But the fact that it's become such a beloved property anyway, spawning two (possibly three) movies and endless themed karaoke parties, feels like hope that art that's imperfect yet earnest  and original  can thrive even when times are tough. Perhaps especially then, when one of the only surefire balms is to dance and jive and have the time of your life."
